accuracy_of_answer.description: The correctness of the response given by the system.

completeness_of_answer.description: The degree to which the answer fully addresses the question.

relevance_of_information_presented.description: The relevance of the information included in the response to the question asked.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the system's reasoning process to understand how the answer was derived.

research_efficiency.description: The efficiency with which the system can gather and synthesize necessary information to formulate an answer.

procedural_correctness.description: Adherence to the steps outlined in the multi-agent plan when addressing the request.

time_taken_to_answer.description: The amount of time required by the system to provide a final answer.

uniqueness_of_information.description: The extent to which the information provided is not a direct copy from readily available internet sources, indicating originality in the response.

progress_tracking.description: The system's ability to track and communicate its progress toward answering the question.

collaboration_effectiveness.description: How well different agents within the system work together to achieve the task.
